inscription:
Signature and Inscriptions

on back, in pencil: [96.1.68] and [000057]
life_date: Auguste Louis Lepère, French, Paris 1849–Domme, Dordogne 1918
medium: Graphite with white heightening on paper
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1996; sold in July for KKOO with etching of same title, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1996-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Study for Grape Harvester
